title: Revoke Template
description: Revokes a Role from another Role

member_resource_type.description: The member type (group, host, user, etc.) for the revoke

member_resource_id.description: The member resource identifier for the revoke

role_resource_type.description: The role type (group, host, user, etc.) for the revoke

role_resource_id.description: The role resource identifier for the revoke
